lyrics:
44 contributorstranslationsελληνικάdeutschreal men lyricsverse 1
real men dont need other people
and real men suck it in
real men dont flinch or bleed in public
oh i think im a real man

verse 2
little boys cry and look around for comfort
and always get what they want
little boys see toys and say i can take that
oh you are my little boy

chorus 1
though honestly sir
all i wanna do is get naked in front of you
so you can look me up and down and tell me
well done girl youre looking good

verse 3
real men keep cool in the face of a fire
go down with the ship
and real men dont eat cause theyre above that damn it
oh im gonna be a real man

chorus 2
ohoh ohoh though honestly sir
all i wanna do is get naked in front of you
so you can look me up and down
and give me your love for being so good
see mitski liveget tickets as low as 55you might also likebridge
but little boys hold me color me
praise me make me feel lovely
for a little while
so little boy say you want me cause well i cant take it

outro
go ahead
do it do it22embed
